ProductInfo.Features:
1280 x 720 (720p HD) POE IP Camera With Dedicated Free iPhone/iPad and Android Apps
Infrared Night Vision to 15 metres and Weatherproof (water and dust proof) to IP67 Rating
Built-in SD card DVR expandable to 64Gb & Multi-zone Motion Sensor
Motion detection & alarms-------Easy to configure motion windows set through the camera user interface. The threshold and sensitivity of these motion windows can be determined by the user, offering total control. The Outdoor Bullet HD 720P range is able to send email notifications, alerts and snapshot to any dedicated email account. This will alert the user to any activity in real time, no matter where the recipient may be.
Power Over Ethernet-------The bullet range is equipped with Power over Ethernet support and can receive both power and data over a single Ethernet network cable. This allows the camera to be placed in areas that aren¡¯t close to a power outlet and allows users to switch to PoE, optimising installation possibilities and making it perfect for installers and end users looking for a convertible and flexible solution.
